name: HL7 Version 2 Model Elements
title: HL7 Version 2 Model Elements
description:
This code system defines HL7 Version 2 Model Elements used for Version 2 to FHIR Translation
This subset addresses model elements used for conversion of V2-FHIR Mapping - Data Types: DR
Source data can be found at https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=37913897

property.description: High value for cardinality, set to 2147483647 if unbounded
The V2 Datatype assigned to this model element

concept.code: This element defines the date from which an access restriction commences until the date it is specifically rescinded
This field contains the date/time or date/time range of the transaction
concept.display: To specify a single point in time, only the first component is valued. When the second component is valued, the field specifies a time interval during which the transaction took place

concept.code: The date and time when the specimen was acquired from the source
This field contains the date and time that the appointment is requested to begin, in the form of a date/time range
This field contains the date range during which assertion of the relationship took place
This field contains the period the staff member started and ended membership in the professional organization
This field contains the date range when the academic degree program took place
This field contains the date range during which the staff member participated in the academic degree program
This field contains the date range in which the practitioner started and ended working at the specific organization unit in the specific practicing specialty category
This field contains the period during which the staff person started and ended the relationship specified in STF-33 Institution Relationship Type Code
Begin and end of billing period
